pkgmetadata.longdescription: CEPII's GeoDist Datasets // Provides data on countries and their main city or agglomeration and the different distance measures and dummy variables indicating whether two countries are contiguous, share a common language or a colonial relationship. The reference article for these datasets is Mayer and Zignago (2011) http://www.cepii.fr/CEPII/en/publications/wp/abstract.as p?NoDoc=3877.
